name: Mohd Sahil
label: Data Scientist
summary: Transforming data into intelligence. Data Scientist with expertise in Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, Generative AI, and Computer Visionâ€”creating intelligent solutions that solve real-world problems and drive meaningful impact.

highlights: Built a data pipeline with Selenium and Scrapy optimized for large-scale scraping using concurrency and multi-threading.
Designed a fast and efficient vector search system using OCR, FAISS, and Transformer-based models.
Architected an end-to-end solution for Intelligent Video Analytics using NVIDIA Jetson Device.
Developed an accurate age and gender detection model using CNN.
Utilized OpenCV for various computer vision applications including image processing and face detection.
Developed AI Agents for conversational systems and task automation in chatbots, voice assistants, and telephony systems.
Designed advanced RAG solutions incorporating Query Expansion, HyDE, Hybrid Search, and Reranker techniques.
Developed AI Voice Assistants with an end-to-end flow for STT, TTS, and VAD integrated with LiveKit.
Built recommendation systems for e-commerce and file organization platforms using machine learning algorithms.

projects.title: Image Search Engine for Fashion Products
projects.summary: Built an Image Search Engine using the ResNet50 architecture to enable seamless and accurate visual search functionality. Managed large image datasets with data augmentation techniques.
highlights: Enhanced model robustness with data augmentation.

projects.title: Email/SMS Spam Classification
projects.summary: Developed an interactive Streamlit app to efficiently identify and filter spam messages. Implemented a Naive Bayes algorithm achieving high accuracy in spam detection.
highlights: Built a Streamlit app for spam classification.
Optimized a Naive Bayes algorithm for reliable performance.

projects.title: A/B Testing over Email Marketing Data
projects.summary: Conducted A/B tests on email campaigns to optimize open rates, click-through rates, and conversions. Applied statistical methods to derive actionable insights.
highlights: Optimized email marketing metrics through A/B testing.
Utilized hypothesis testing and t-tests for data-driven decisions.

degrees: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
